member.name: D3D12_LIFETIME_STATE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the lifetime state of a lifetime-tracked object.

member.name: D3D12_LIFETIME_STATE.D3D12_LIFETIME_STATE_IN_USE
member.summary: Specifies that the lifetime-tracked object is in use.

member.name: D3D12_LIFETIME_STATE.D3D12_LIFETIME_STATE_NOT_IN_USE
member.summary: Specifies that the lifetime-tracked object is not in use.
